data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 173,881 believers in Norte de Santander and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Norte de Santander, Colombia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Norte de Santander, Colombia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Norte de Santander, Colombia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Norte de Santander that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Norte de Santander, Colombia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Norte de Santander, Colombia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Norte de Santander to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.section_summary:
the state of Norte de Santander, Colombia has a population of 1,620,300.

We estimate Norte de Santander has 173,881 people who might know Jesus, 1,342,278 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 104,142 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.
